Archived Releases

The complete download archive of older releases of Knopferfish.

Current production releases are available from the Download section.

See License section on how KF is licensed.

Knopflerfish 2.3.1

Release Date: 2009-05-08 Release Notes
Name Size Description
knopflerfish_osgi_2.3.1.jar 20.4 MiB Complete framework, including source code and docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_fullbin_osgi_2.3.1.jar 6.70 MiB Full binary framework and bundles. No source or docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_bin_osgi_2.3.1.jar
 1.26 MiB Core binary framework and some bundles. No source or docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_opt_2.3.1.jar
 31.3 MiB A set of optional bundles, including SOAP support for any OSGi service. See Bundle User Documentation for details. Also includes support for OSGi Metatype data and a desktop UI for CM. This download should be installed on top of a previous installation. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_osgi_tiny_2.3.1.zip
 347 KiB Remotely loading framework, no source, no docs, just framework.jar and config files for loading all bundles from the web.
knopflerfish_osgi_tests_2.3.1.zip
 3.17 MiB Bundles for testing the framework and selected services using JUnit.

Released: 2009-04-20 Release Notes
Name Size Description
knopflerfish_osgi_1.3.7.jar
 8.0M Complete framework, including source code and docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_fullbin_osgi_1.3.7.jar
 2.6M Full binary framework and bundles. No source or docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_bin_osgi_1.3.7.jar
 2.4M Core binary framework and some bundles. No source or docs. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_osgi_tiny_1.3.7.zip
 222K Remotely loading framework, no source, no docs, just framework.jar and config files for loading all bundles from the web.
knopflerfish_opt_1.3.7.jar 6.9M A set of optional bundles, including SOAP support for any OSGi service. See SOAP readme for details. Also includes support for OSGi Metatype data and a desktop UI for CM. This download should be installed on top of a previous installation. Self-extracting.
knopflerfish_osgi_tests_1.3.7.zip
 2.0M Bundles for testing the framework and selected services using JUnit.

(approx 6.5 MB, including Apache Axis SOAP libraries) 		6.8M A set of optional bundles, including SOAP support for any OSGi service. See SOAP readme for details. Also includes support for OSGi Metatype data and a desktop UI for CM. This download should be installed on top of a previous installation. Self-extracting.
